thilina gamage ha kanishka wijerathna athara athi samipa mithurukama gana thorathuru thibiyadi kanishka wijerathna me naduwa asimen walaki sitiya yuthuwa thibiyadi ha rajaye nithignyawaraya wirodhaya palakaraddi naduwa asima, thilina gamageta wisheshayak washayen ratha්ri 7 wanathuru naduwa asima, thilina gamageta paminimata ha aapasu yamata winisuruwarun pamanak bhawitha karana widuli sopanaya yodaganimata idadima, apa kondesi sapuranne nathiwa thilina gamageta pitawa yannata ida harima yana karana sambandhayen parikshanayak pawathwana lesa ema lipiyen illa athi bawa danagannata thibe.
